title: Design of Digital-Based Inclusive Science Learning Environments: Application of Flipped Learning and Collaborative Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories, proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Digital learning environment construction and project-based competency development program for science field job seekers

learning_goals: Pre-learn weekly science topics using the flipped learning model and achieve over 80% participation in discussions
Develop and share three or more inclusive learning scenarios using collaborative design tools
Achieve 4+ points (out of 5) on digital tool utilization assessment criteria during science project implementation
Formulate student-led learning plans and document 5+ weekly hours of self-directed study
Design science experiment simulations reflecting diverse learner needs and earn 4+ points in peer evaluations

resources: FLeD Analog Digital Design Tool (Free Version)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
